Method Detail

getContacts

ResultSet<Contact> getContacts(String accessToken,
                               Integer limit,
                               String modifiedSinceTimestamp)
                               throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the get Contacts operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
limit - Limit.
modifiedSinceTimestamp - This time stamp is an ISO-8601 ordinal date supporting offset.
It will return only the contacts modified since the supplied date.
If you want to bypass this filter set modifiedSinceTimestamp to null.
Returns:
A ResultSet of Contact containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

getContact

Contact getContact(String accesToken,
                   String contactId)
                   throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the get Contact operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accesToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
contactId - Unique contact id.
Returns:
Returns a Contact containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

                                     String email)
                                     throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the get Contact By Email operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
email - Contact email address to search for.
Returns:
Returns a ResultSet of Contact containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

                   Contact contact,
                   Boolean actionByVisitor)
                   throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the add Contact operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
contact - Contact to add.
Returns:
Returns the newly created Contact containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

deleteContact

boolean deleteContact(String accessToken,
                      String contactId)
                      throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the delete Contact operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
contactId - Unique contact id of the contact to delete.
Returns:
Returns true if operation succeeded; an exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

                               throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the delete Contact From Lists (all lists) operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:

contactId - Contact id to be removed from all the lists.
Returns:
Returns true if operation succeeded; an exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

deleteContactFromList

boolean deleteContactFromList(String accessToken,
                              String contactId,
                              String listId)
                              throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the delete Contact From List (a specific list) operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
contactId - Contact id to be removed.
listId - ContactList to remove the contact from.
Returns:
Returns true if operation succeeded; an exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.

updateContact

Contact updateContact(String accessToken,
                      Contact contact,
                      Boolean actionByVisitor)
                      throws ConstantContactServiceException
Implements the update Contact operation of the Contacts API by calling the ConstantContact server side.
A specific contact is identified by its internal id.

Parameters:
accessToken - Constant Contact OAuth2 access token.
contact - Contact to be updated.
Returns:
Returns the updated Contact containing data as returned by the server on success;
An exception is thrown otherwise.
Throws:
ConstantContactServiceException - When something went wrong in the Constant Contact flow or an error is returned from server.
